faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions

privacy.question: How secure is my data?
privacy.answer: Your data is protected with state-of-the-art encryption and stored exclusively in the EU. We meet all GDPR requirements.

password.question: Do you store my Outlook credentials?
password.answer: No, we never store your passwords. Authentication happens securely via OAuth 2.0 from Microsoft.

responses.question: How are response drafts created?
responses.answer: Our AI analyzes the context of your emails and creates appropriate responses based on your previous communications and industry-specific templates.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can end your subscription at any time without notice. Unused days will be refunded proportionally.

dataStorage.question: Where is my data stored?
dataStorage.answer: All data is stored and processed exclusively on servers in the European Union.

setup.question: How long does setup take?
setup.answer: Basic setup takes only a few minutes. After connecting your Outlook account, you can start immediately.

support.question: What support do I receive?
support.answer: We offer email support and live chat during business hours. Premium customers also receive prioritized support.

startTime.question: When can I start?
startTime.answer: You can start immediately after signing up. The first 50 email drafts are free, no credit card required.

emailDraft.title: Always in Complete Control
emailDraft.description: EmailManager only creates drafts – emails are never automatically sent without your approval. You review and approve every draft before it's sent.
